SEARCH
Package org.nse.thesis.wordindex.ffm

Record Class FFMNativeHandles

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
org.nse.thesis.wordindex.ffm.FFMNativeHandles
Record Components:
openIndex - Open index function-handle
closeIndex - Close index function-handle
closeIterator - Close iterator function-handle
query - query function-handle
public record FFMNativeHandles(MethodHandle openIndex, MethodHandle closeIndex, MethodHandle closeIterator, MethodHandle query) extends Record
Container record that holds function handles to native library. Usage
  1. Load the library with load(String) to load the library before accessing the singleton
  2. Use the get() to get the singleton instance.

OR

Do both with get(String) and pass the path to the library first time.
